channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Idiots parked on the junction and pavement., 19th November
item.description:
Idiots parked on the juction and the pavement making the pavement unusable and the junction dangerous. Its on ongoing issue.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Acre, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 19th November
item.description:
Customer reports that there have been barriers & cones in place on a section of c/way since September. No sign of any work that needs to be done, and are currently narrowing the road on the junction - asking if these can be removed if they're not needed.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Highly Dangerous Pothole in left lane, 19th November
item.description:
A huge pothole on Corinum Ave just past the exit of Walls factory is again deteriorating. This was patched a few weeks ago but it is already lifting. Highly dangerous as cars are now swerving to avoid it. Please repair ASAP. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Corinium Avenue, Barnwood, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Holes in the road near bus stop - getting progressively worse, 19th November
item.description:
On Gloucester Road, right by bus stop. Holes in the road getting very bad indeed. Damage to car when driving. Photos attached. Has been poor for years. Winter weather will make the road even worse. Especially with all traffic travelling along the road it will cause serious damage before long.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 196, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
